title: CHAMPION SELECT ISSUE
body: I NEED HELP. I WANT TO PLAY MATCHES FROM MY ACCOUNT Lefterispower AT EUNE. BUT WHEN IT COMES TO THE CHAMPION SELECT IT DOES NOT LET ME ENTER IT. AND AS A RESULT I CANNOT CHOOSE A CHAMPION AND I END UP WITH A BAN, LOSS OF LP AND LOSS OF TIME. HELP ME FIX IT PLEASE. I ALREADY LOST 50 LP DUE TO THAT ISSUE.  THIS HAPPENS ONLY WITH  **_THIS_** ACCOUNT. WHEN I PLAY WITH MY OTHER ACCOUNTS EVERYTHING WAS OK. BUT THIS IS MY MAIN AND I NEED YOUE HELP.

replies.body: Can you describe what specific behavior or symptoms you're experiencing with this account? Are you seeing a black screen or an error message, something specific?

I have the same problem with the beta client. I now have a 30 minute ban from playing >.>. Try using the old client for now, on the login screen you have the option to choose "use legacy client" click that and it'll let you use the old client for now. I hope Riot leaves the option to use the old client as it functions a lot better on my computer, and I'm sure a lot of other players would rather use the old client too. Hope someone sees this comment...
I believe I'm experiencing a similar issue, I can log in and and go about the client normally but when I try to play I am greeted with a black screen at Champ Select.
